nodes.text: Guy Boyd (born April 13, 1943) is an American actor who portrayed Jeremitt Towani in Caravan of Courage: An Ewok Adventure (1984). He did not return, however, for the 1985 sequel, Ewoks: The Battle for Endor, because he felt the role was "too brief." In The Battle for Endor, Paul Gleason played Jeremitt.
